thread.title: Man Utd boss Jose Mourinho wants £30m Arsenal ace who fits the bill: Chelsea duo preferred
thread.title_full: Man Utd boss Jose Mourinho wants £30m Arsenal ace who fits the bill: Chelsea duo preferred

title: Man Utd boss Jose Mourinho wants £30m Arsenal ace who fits the bill: Chelsea duo preferred
text: Man Utd boss Jose Mourinho wants £30m Arsenal ace who fits the bill: Chelsea duo preferred JOSE MOURINHO is reportedly eyeing a move to bring Arsenal winger Alex Oxlade-Chamberlain to Manchester United. PUBLISHED: 00:01, Sun, Feb 19, 2017 | UPDATED: 00:03, Sun, Feb 19, 2017 The Manchester United boss has identified the Gunners star as a £30million summer target. Oxlade-Chamberlain, 23, has impressed during his Arsenal career but failed to deliver on a consistent basis, having scored just three Premier league goals in the past two seasons. However, Mourinho has belief in the versatile midfielder and feels he would fit into his plans at Old Trafford as Oxlade-Chamberlain continues his development. According to the Mirror , a transfer will be pursued by Mourinho for the Arsenal ace. GETTY Alex Oxlade-Chamberlain has impressed of late for Arsenal in a central midfield role Chris Smalling’s future could also help smooth a deal if the Gunners firm-up their long-term interest And Chris Smalling’s future could also help smooth a deal if the Gunners firm-up their long-term interest in the centre-half. It is suggested the possibility of a move for Oxlade-Chamberlain will be strengthened if Arsenal look to sign Smalling from United. The two rivals have done business in the past, with Robin van Persie and Danny Welbeck having headed in opposite directions. Jose Mourinho is keen to bolster his midfield following the January departures of Memphis Depay and Morgan Schneiderlin. GETTY Jose Mourinho feels Arsenal's Alex Oxlade-Chamberlain fits the bill to develop at Manchester United Eight players Manchester United could sign this summer Sat, February 11, 2017
